title: May 30th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: May 30th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian family update, Dave Chappelle, + Jersey Shore Show Reboot
description:
This week the basic and the brain talk all things Kardashians (from Kourtney's semen comments, to backlash over Kim Kardashian's involvement with Beyond Meat), provide an update on Dave Chappelle's attacker, and discuss the Jersey Shore Reboot. See below for more in depth detail on the topics covered this week:


Kardashian Family Update

  • The Kardashians "Where I've Been and Where I Wanna Go" Episode Review
  • Kourtney Kardashian's doctor tells her to drink Travis Barker's Semen 4 times a week
  • Kris and Kylie get backlash after grocery shopping and washing their car
  • Backlash over Kim Kardashian’s Beyond Meat Ad as their Chief Taste Consultant


Dave Chappelle

  • Man Accused Of Attacking Dave Chappelle Charged With Attempted Murder For Allegedly Stabbing Roommate


Jersey Shore 2.0 (Reboot)

  • Jersey Shore’ Original Crew Are Not Down for an MTV Reboot With New Cast




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
